alert.note: Alert for Carter; Garvin; Jefferson; Murray; Stephens (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 17 at 8:47PM CST until December 17 at 9:30PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Jefferson County in southern Oklahoma... South central Garvin County in southern Oklahoma... Southern Stephens County in southern Oklahoma... Northwestern Carter County in southern Oklahoma... Southwestern Murray County in southern Oklahoma... * Until 930 PM CST. * At 846 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Comanche, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Comanche, Velma, Katie, Tatums, Loco, Ratliff City, Addington, Graham, Pooleville, Hennepin, Milo, Empire City and Fox. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
